page.title: 17LIVING IN FAIRFORD IN l985
page.content: I'm a{fifteen year old boy}and I have lived all of my life in this area. I have very mixed feelings about living here. In summer I wouldn't want to live anywhere else, the place looks splendid with the trees at their best. Cycling or walking around, going fishing in nearby gravel pits all give me a sense of freedom in unspoilt surroundings. Winter in the area is a totally different proposition. Apart from the Youth Club disco on Friday evenings there is not much going on for young people. Consequently life becomes a diet of television and homework. Even so I don't think that I would change my life style for a city one, the summers certainly excuse everything else.
